channel.title: Comments on: 33rd Birthday Party Pictures
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Thank you (and for the shirt as well :)
item.content:encoded: Thank you (and for the shirt as well :)

item.title: By: Eti
item.dc:creator: Eti
item.description: You all look beautiful and I like your shirt! Wish you a lot of happiness!
item.content:encoded:
You all look beautiful and I like your shirt!
Wish you a lot of happiness!

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: It does! It was re-opened a month ago with this low-tech design. Everyone thought it was really clever, but I thought it was dodgy. Anyway, as people started showing up and in the mood, it didn't matter.
item.content:encoded: It does! It was re-opened a month ago with this low-tech design. Everyone thought it was really clever, but I thought it was dodgy. Anyway, as people started showing up and in the mood, it didn’t matter.

item.title: By: Shahar
item.dc:creator: Shahar
item.description: The place looks as though it was built just for the party :)
item.content:encoded: The place looks as though it was built just for the party :)
